verses.verse: Now these <S%H428><s%> are the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> left, <S%H5117><s%> to prove <S%H5254><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> by them, even as many of Israel as had not known <S%H3045><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the wars <S%H4421><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> that the generations <S%H1755><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> might know, <S%H3045><s%> to teach <S%H3925><s%> them war, <S%H4421><s%> at <S%H7535><s%> the least <S%H7535><s%> such as before <S%H6440><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> nothing <S%H3808><s%> thereof;

Namely, five <S%H2568><s%> lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and the Sidonians, <S%H6722><s%> and the Hivites <S%H2340><s%> that dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> from mount <S%H2022><s%> Baalhermon <S%H1179><s%> to the entering <S%H935><s%> in of Hamath. <S%H2574><s%>

And they were to prove <S%H5254><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> by them, to know <S%H3045><s%> whether they would listen <S%H8085><s%> to the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he commanded <S%H6680><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and Perizzites, <S%H6522><s%> and Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> and Jebusites: <S%H2983><s%>

And they took <S%H3947><s%> their daughters <S%H1323><s%> to be their wives, <S%H802><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> their daughters <S%H1323><s%> to their sons, <S%H1121><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> their gods. <S%H430><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and forgot <S%H7911><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> Baalim <S%H1168><s%> and the groves. <S%H842><s%>

Therefore the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was hot <S%H2734><s%> against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and he sold <S%H4376><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Chushanrishathaim <S%H3573><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Mesopotamia: <S%H763><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> Chushanrishathaim <S%H3573><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> raised <S%H6965><s%> up a deliverer <S%H3467><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who delivered <S%H3467><s%> them, even <S%H853><s%> Othniel <S%H6274><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kenaz, <S%H7073><s%> Caleb's <S%H3612><s%> younger <S%H6996><s%> brother. <S%H251><s%>

And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> on him, and he judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> out to war: <S%H4421><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> Chushanrishathaim <S%H3573><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Mesopotamia <S%H763><s%> into his hand; <S%H3027><s%> and his hand <S%H3027><s%> prevailed <S%H5810><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Chushanrishathaim. <S%H3573><s%>
And the land <S%H776><s%> had rest <S%H8252><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%> And Othniel <S%H6274><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kenaz <S%H7073><s%> died. <S%H4191><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> strengthened <S%H2388><s%> Eglon <S%H5700><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3588><s%> they had done <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And he gathered <S%H622><s%> to him the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> and Amalek, <S%H6002><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and possessed <S%H3423><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of palm <S%H8558><s%> trees.
So the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> Eglon <S%H5700><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> eighteen <S%H8083><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

But when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> raised <S%H6965><s%> them up a deliverer, <S%H3467><s%> Ehud <S%H261><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gera, <S%H1617><s%> a Benjamite, <S%H1145><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> left handed: <S%H334><s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H3225><s%> and by him the c <S%H1121><s%>hildren of <S%H3478><s%> Isra <S%H7971><s%>el sent a <S%H4503><s%>present t <S%H5700><s%>o Eglon t <S%H4428><s%>he king o <S%H4124><s%>f Moab.

But Ehud <S%H261><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> him a dagger <S%H2719><s%> which had two <S%H8147><s%> edges, <S%H6366><s%> of a cubit <S%H1574><s%> length; <S%H753><s%> and he did gird <S%H2296><s%> it under <S%H8478><s%> his raiment <S%H4055><s%> on his right <S%H3225><s%> thigh. <S%H3409><s%>

And he brought <S%H7126><s%> the present <S%H4503><s%> to Eglon <S%H5700><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab: <S%H4124><s%> and Eglon <S%H5700><s%> was a very <S%H3966><s%> fat <S%H1277><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>

And when <S%H834><s%> he had made an end <S%H3615><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> the present, <S%H4503><s%> he sent <S%H7971><s%> away the people <S%H5971><s%> that bore <S%H5375><s%> the present. <S%H4503><s%>

But he himself <S%H1931><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> from the quarries <S%H6456><s%> that were by Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> I have a secret <S%H5643><s%> errand <S%H1697><s%> to you, O king: <S%H4428><s%> who said, <S%H559><s%> Keep silence. <S%H2013><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> that stood <S%H5975><s%> by him went <S%H3318><s%> out from him.

And Ehud <S%H261><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to him; and he was sitting <S%H3427><s%> in a summer <S%H4747><s%> parlor, <S%H5944><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had for himself alone. <S%H905><s%> And Ehud <S%H261><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I have a message <S%H1697><s%> from God <S%H430><s%> to you. And he arose <S%H6965><s%> out of his seat. <S%H3678><s%>

And Ehud <S%H261><s%> put <S%H7971><s%> forth <S%H7971><s%> his left <S%H8040><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the dagger <S%H2719><s%> from his right <S%H3225><s%> thigh, <S%H3409><s%> and thrust <S%H8628><s%> it into his belly: <S%H990><s%>

And the haft <S%H5325><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> went <S%H935><s%> in after <S%H310><s%> the blade; <S%H3851><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> closed <S%H5462><s%> on the blade, <S%H3851><s%> so <S%H3588><s%> that he could not draw <S%H8025><s%> the dagger <S%H2719><s%> out of his belly; <S%H990><s%> and the dirt <S%H6574><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out.

Then Ehud <S%H261><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> through the porch, <S%H4528><s%> and shut <S%H5462><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> of the parlor <S%H5944><s%> on him, and locked <S%H5274><s%> them.

When he was gone <S%H3318><s%> out, his servants <S%H5650><s%> came; <S%H935><s%> and when they saw <S%H7200><s%> that, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> of the parlor <S%H5944><s%> were locked, <S%H5274><s%> they said, <S%H559><s%> Surely <S%H389><s%> he covers <S%H5526><s%> his feet <S%H7272><s%> in his summer <S%H4747><s%> chamber. <S%H2315><s%>

And they tarried <S%H2342><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> they were ashamed: <S%H954><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> he opened <S%H6605><s%> not the doors <S%H1817><s%> of the parlor; <S%H5944><s%> therefore they took <S%H3947><s%> a key, <S%H4668><s%> and opened <S%H6605><s%> them: and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> their lord <S%H113><s%> was fallen <S%H5307><s%> down dead <S%H4191><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And Ehud <S%H261><s%> escaped <S%H4422><s%> while <S%H5704><s%> they tarried, <S%H4102><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> beyond <S%H5674><s%> the quarries, <S%H6456><s%> and escaped <S%H4422><s%> to Seirath. <S%H8167><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when he was come, <S%H935><s%> that he blew <S%H8628><s%> a trumpet <S%H7782><s%> in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> with him from the mount, <S%H2022><s%> and he before <S%H6440><s%> them.

And he said <S%H559><s%> to them, Follow <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> me: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> the Moabites <S%H4124><s%> into your hand. <S%H3027><s%> And they went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, and took <S%H3920><s%> the fords <S%H4569><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and suffered <S%H5414><s%> not a man <S%H376><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> over. <S%H5674><s%>

And they slew <S%H5221><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%> about ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> lusty, <S%H8082><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of valor; <S%H2428><s%> and there escaped <S%H4422><s%> not a man. <S%H376><s%>

So Moab <S%H4124><s%> was subdued <S%H3665><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> And the land <S%H776><s%> had rest <S%H8252><s%> fourscore <S%H8084><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And after <S%H310><s%> him was Shamgar <S%H8044><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Anath, <S%H6067><s%> which slew <S%H5221><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> with an ox <S%H1241><s%> goad: <S%H4451><s%> and he also <S%H1571><s%> delivered <S%H3467><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
